snippet: RUTENBERG--Alice, 93 years old, died on February 1, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Irving. Devoted mother of Bill and Marsha and Jon and Debbie. Cherished grandmother of Craig (Stephanie), Diana, Michael (Stacey), Jamie, and Lauren (Jay). Loving great-grandmother of Jonah and Lyla. Graveside services Sunday at 11am at Beth Moses Cemetery, Pinelawn, New York. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RUTENBERG--Alice, 93 years old, died on February 1, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Irving. Devoted mother of Bill and Marsha and Jon and Debbie.
